check.name: ExpiredTodoComment
check.description:
Checks for expired {@code } comments. Actually it is a generic pattern matcher on Java comments. To check for other patterns in Java comments, set the {@code pattern} property.

Live template example from IntelliJ IDEA. Example: //TODO $DATE$ $USER$ requires remove ISSUE-1234$END$ env: date("dd.MM.Y") user()

Using {@code } comments is a great way to keep track of tasks that need to be done. Having them reported by Checkstyle makes it very hard to forget about them.

property.name: pattern
property.description: Specify pattern to match comments against. Should contain groups {@code date} and {@code comment}
